config.query: SELECT eai.FKSKU AS SKU_ID, sc.IMAGE_STYLEID AS STYLE_ID, '00250' AS STORE_ID, 't' as CHECKIND, eai.QTY AS QOH, eai.QTY AS QOHSELLABLE, CAST(0 AS NUMBER(13)) AS QOHNOTSELLABLE, CAST(0 AS NUMBER(13)) AS QOO, CAST(0 AS NUMBER(13)) AS QBO, CAST(0 AS NUMBER(13)) AS QIT, CAST(0 AS NUMBER(13)) AS QIP, CAST(eai.LASTMODIFIEDDATE AS TIMESTAMP) AS LASTMODIFIEDDATE, TO_CHAR(eai.FKORGANIZATIONNO) as INV_FKORGANIZATIONNO, 't' AS IS_ENDLESS_AISLE FROM VSTORE.ENDLESS_AISLE_INVENTORY eai INNER JOIN VSTORE.SKU s ON eai.FKSKU = s.PKSKU INNER JOIN ELCAT.STYLE_COLOURS sc ON SUBSTR(sc.STYLEID,1,8) = s.fkstyleno WHERE eai.IPC_CODE = 'UPCE' AND CAST(eai.LASTMODIFIEDDATE AS TIMESTAMP) >= sysdate - interval '1440' minute
